name: power-merge
description: Merge multiple objects and/or arrays in a configurable way by defining rules that govern whether an attribute should be cloned, referenced, recursed, mutated or ignored

scripts.coverage: nyc --report html --reporter lcov --reporter text-summary mocha test
scripts.codeclimate: (test -e .codeclimate && npm run coverage && source .codeclimate) || echo skipping codeclimate

author: Stephen Cresswell

hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run codeclimate
